member.name: D3D_MIN_PRECISION
member.summary: Values that indicate the minimum desired interpolation precision.

member.name: D3D_MIN_PRECISION.D3D_MIN_PRECISION_DEFAULT
member.summary: Default minimum precision, which is 32-bit precision.

member.name: D3D_MIN_PRECISION.D3D_MIN_PRECISION_FLOAT_16
member.summary: Minimum precision is min16float, which is 16-bit floating point.

member.name: D3D_MIN_PRECISION.D3D_MIN_PRECISION_FLOAT_2_8
member.summary: Minimum precision is min10float, which is 10-bit floating point.

member.name: D3D_MIN_PRECISION.D3D_MIN_PRECISION_SINT_16
member.summary: Minimum precision is min16int, which is 16-bit signed integer.

member.name: D3D_MIN_PRECISION.D3D_MIN_PRECISION_UINT_16
member.summary: Minimum precision is min16uint, which is 16-bit unsigned integer.
